Content.Text: Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <MYNAME>, how's your farm doing? I
came here today to tell you about a new
<RED>festival</RED> that I decided to throw.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And that festival is... the <RED>Firefly
Festival</RED>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We go watch the fireflies by the river
one summer night. It would be great if
you could join us, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Firefly Festival is held on <BLUE>Summer 7</BLUE>
from <BLUE>8:00 PM</BLUE> at the <GREEN>festival grounds</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
On the day, be sure to come talk to me
at the festival entrance before <BLUE>10:00
PM</BLUE>, OK?
<PAGE>
You can't partake if you're late,
so watch the time, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can confirm the festival's details
on the <BLUE>calendar</BLUE>, so look it over if you
need to.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, I must be on my way. Sorry to
barge in so early in the morning. Give
it your best today!
